Class Requests

  • java.lang.Object
    • Requests
  • public class Requests
extends java.lang.Object
    The Requests class represents the list of requests.

    An instance from the class Requests has 2 variables:

    • A priority queue of Person which represents the requests order by the steps.
    • A map which represents requests on hold which have been affected to a Lift. A key represents the identificator of a Person and its value the identificator of a Lift.
    • A list of all the people who have requests.
    • The total amount of requests.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Requests

        public Requests​(int nbMaxPerson,
                int lambda,
                int nbFloor)
        Constructs an instance of the Requests class. This is the constructor for a random generation of the Person.
        Parameters:
        nbMaxPerson - The maximal number of Person to create.
        lambda - The parameter of the poisson's law used to randomly generate the step of the Person.
        nbFloor - The second parameter of the uniform law used to randomly generate the startFloor and endFloor of the Person, the first one is 0 by default.
        See Also:
        Person

      • Requests

        public Requests​(java.lang.String FileName)
        Constructs an instance of the Requests class. This is the constructor for a file containing all the requests.
        Parameters:
        FileName - The file containing all the requests that will be changed into several Person, each representing a request.
